content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands, including conda init bash and source commands, but all returned errors such as "conda: not found" or "source: not found". I tried multiple
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b'/bin/sh: 1: .: activate: not found\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "conda activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b'/bin/sh: 1: conda: not found\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "/opt/conda/bin/conda activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:

b''
STDERR:
